title: so i get a leaverbuster because the client black screens.
body:
so i just recently finished a low priority queue and not but 2  games later the client decides to fucking shititself by black screening then when i close it and reconnect it just sits there on 0% until it says this game is no longer avaliable and ive lost 18 lp and now have another 5 x 20 minute low priority queue

seriously can you like fix this shit instead of just putting out  new champs and new skins. this shit constantly happens and im fucking over it and im sure im not alone. having to wait an hour and 40 minutes for something that wasn't even my fault is a fucking joke.im not playing till the low priority queue is gone which probably means im no longer playing this game.
